price: 104. Ya solo, baye bazali kondima na mikapo mia Allah te, Allah akokambaka bango te, mpe bakozuaka etumbu ya makasi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi lā yahdīhimu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
